DOC.brief_title: Prospective Study Investigational Toric Soft Contact Lens
DOC.detailed_description: Eligible participant randomize 2:1 wear either DAILIES® AquaComfort Plus® Toric Focus® DAILIES® Toric .

Any active anterior segment systemic disease would contraindicate contact lens wear . Use systemic medication would contraindicate lens wear .
